Title: Zen: Intergalactic Ninja
RichPresencePatch:
Lookup:Bonus
0=Collecting cans in the Dust Area Bonus
1=Shooting cans in the Dam Area Bonus
2=Clearing the smoke in the Smog Area Bonus
3=Saving the seabirds in the Oil Area Bonus

Lookup:Boss
0=Fighting Garbageman in the Dust Area
1=Fighting Sulfura in the Dam Area
2=Fighting Smogger in the Smog Area
3=Fighting Oil Slick in the Oil Area
4=Fighting Lord Contanimous in the Final Area

Lookup:GameArea
0=Taking out the trash in the Dust Area
1=Clarifying the water in the Dam Area
2=Purifying the air in the Smog Area
3=Cleaning the mess in the Oil Area
4=Saving the world in the Final Area

Lookup:GameState
1=Watching Intro
2=On Title Screen
3=Preparing to save the World
5=Preparing to save the World
7=Preparing to save the World
9=Preparing to save the World
11=Watching the ending after saving the World
14=Preparing to save the World
15=On Title Screen

Format:Number
FormatType=VALUE

Display:
?1=1S0xH00dee0=1S0xH00dee0=2S0xH00dee0=15?@GameState(0xH00dee0)
?0xH00dee0=6_0xH00dee1!=3?@GameArea(0xH00def1) | Lives: @Number(0xH00deda_v-1) | Score: @Number(b0xI00c38e*100) | Continues Used: @Number(N:0xH00dee0=7_M:0xH00dee1=9)
?0xH00dee0=6_0xH00dee1=3?@Boss(0xH00def1) | Lives: @Number(0xH00deda_v-1) | Score: @Number(b0xI00c38e*100) | Continues Used: @Number(N:0xH00dee0=7_M:0xH00dee1=9)
?1=1S0xH00dee0=7S0xH00dee0=14S0xH00dee0=3S0xH00dee0=5S0xH00dee0=11S0xH00dee0=9?@GameState(0xH00dee0) | Lives: @Number(0xH00deda_v-1) | Score: @Number(b0xI00c38e*100) | Continues Used: @Number(N:0xH00dee0=7_M:0xH00dee1=9)
?1=1S0xH00dee0=8S0xH00dee0=10?@Bonus(0xH00def1) | Lives: @Number(0xH00deda_v-1) | Score: @Number(b0xI00c38e*100) | Continues Used: @Number(N:0xH00dee0=7_M:0xH00dee1=9)
Playing Zen: Intergalactic Ninja

Achievements.Title: Zen-sational
Achievements.Description: Achieve a high score greater than 30000
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Peak Zen
Achievements.Description: Achieve a high score greater than 120000
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: The Power of Zen
Achievements.Description: Collect a Power Crystal and become invulnerable
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Zen-durance Up
Achievements.Description: Collected a Life Up item and replenished your health
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: One Life, One Zen
Achievements.Description: Collected a Zen Up item and increase your lives
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: One Slick Ticket
Achievements.Description: Complete the Oil Area
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Down with the Slickness
Achievements.Description: Complete the Oil Area without losing a life
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Down the Drain
Achievements.Description: Reach the bottom of the Pipes Decent in the Oil Area without taking damage (no power crystal)
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Not that Slick
Achievements.Description: Defeat Oil Slick in the Oil Area using only melee attacks
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Greased Lightning
Achievements.Description: Damage Oil Slick 3 times with charged attacks in a single phase
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Seabird Sanctuary
Achievements.Description: Complete the Oil Area Bonus Stage and save all of the Sea Birds
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Did the Dam Thing
Achievements.Description: Complete the Dam Area
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Dam Right!
Achievements.Description: Complete the Dam Area without losing a life
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Fighting the Current
Achievements.Description: Reach the top of the Waterfall Ascent in the Dam Area without falling too far
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Rainy Day Parade
Achievements.Description: Defeat Sulfura in the Dam Area using only melee attacks
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Rain Check
Achievements.Description: Defeat Sulfura in the Dam Area before her acid rain phase
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Nature is Saved
Achievements.Description: Complete the Dam Area Bonus Stage and shoot all of the cans
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Done and Dusted
Achievements.Description: Complete the Dust Area
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Eat my Dust
Achievements.Description: Complete the Dust Area without losing a life
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Clear as Mud
Achievements.Description: Collect the Zen Up during the Mudslide Decent in the Dust Area and reach the bottom without losing a life
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Stinky Stopper
Achievements.Description: Defeat Garbageman in the Dust Area using only melee attacks
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Taking out the Trash
Achievements.Description: Defeat Garbageman in the Dust Area in 2 phases or less
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Not a Garbage Can't
Achievements.Description: Complete the Dust Area Bonus Stage and collect all of the cans
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: A Breath of Fresh Air
Achievements.Description: Complete the Smog Area
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: In the O-Zone
Achievements.Description: Complete the Smog Area without losing a life
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Storm Sidestepper
Achievements.Description: Reach the end of the Acid Rain section of the Smog Area without taking damage from any source (no power crystal)
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Clean Air Reigns
Achievements.Description: Defeat Smogger in the Smog Area using only melee attacks
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Walking on Air
Achievements.Description: Defeat Smogger in the Smog Area in 2 phases or less
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Clear Skies
Achievements.Description: Complete the Smog Area Bonus Stage and destroy every smoke cloud
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Emission Accomplished
Achievements.Description: Complete the Final Area
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Flawless Finale
Achievements.Description: Complete the Final Area without losing a life
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Hard Rain
Achievements.Description: Collect the Zen Up during the Rockfall Decent in the Final Area and reach the bottom without taking damage (no power crystal)
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Creepazoid Crusher
Achievements.Description: Free Jeremy and defeat Lord Contanimous in the Final Area using only melee attacks
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Achievements.Title: Industrial Wasted
Achievements.Description: Free Jeremy and defeat Lord Contanimous before reaching his Oil Phase
Achievements.Author: TwosomesUP

Leaderboards.Title: Oil Area - Time Attack
Leaderboards.Description: Defeat Oil Slick and reach the end of the Oil Area as quickly as possible

Leaderboards.Title: Dam Area - Time Attack
Leaderboards.Description: Defeat Sulfura and reach the end of the Dam Area as quickly as possible

Leaderboards.Title: Dust Area - Time Attack
Leaderboards.Description: Defeat Garbageman and reach the end of the Dust Area as quickly as possible

Leaderboards.Title: Smog Area - Time Attack
Leaderboards.Description: Defeat Smogger and reach the end of the Smog Area as quickly as possible

Leaderboards.Title: Final Area - Time Attack
Leaderboards.Description: Defeat Lord Contanimous and reach the end of the Final Area as quickly as possible (Final Area code allowed)
